name: Random Name Generator
description: Generate random funny names, superhero names, or fantasy character names.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-wand-sparkles size-5"><path d="m21.64 3.64-1.28-1.28a1.21 1.21 0 0 0-1.72 0L2.36 18.64a1.21 1.21 0 0 0 0 1.72l1.28 1.28a1.2 1.2 0 0 0 1.72 0L21.64 5.36a1.2 1.2 0 0 0 0-1.72"></path><path d="m14 7 3 3"></path><path d="M5 6v4"></path><path d="M19 14v4"></path><path d="M10 2v2"></path><path d="M7 8H3"></path><path d="M21 16h-4"></path><path d="M11 3H9"></path></svg>

name: Fortune Cookie
description: Get your daily fortune cookie message with lucky numbers!

name: Joke Generator
description: Generate random jokes, puns, and dad jokes to brighten your day.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-laugh size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><path d="M18 13a6 6 0 0 1-6 5 6 6 0 0 1-6-5h12Z"></path><line x1="9" x2="9.01" y1="9" y2="9"></line><line x1="15" x2="15.01" y1="9" y2="9"></line></svg>

name: Word Chain Game
description: Play the classic word chain game - each word must start with the last letter of the previous word.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-message-square size-5"><path d="M21 15a2 2 0 0 1-2 2H7l-4 4V5a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2z"></path></svg>

name: Emoji Story Generator
description: Create fun stories using only emojis! Perfect for social media posts.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-smile size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><path d="M8 14s1.5 2 4 2 4-2 4-2"></path><line x1="9" x2="9.01" y1="9" y2="9"></line><line x1="15" x2="15.01" y1="9" y2="9"></line></svg>

name: Random Decision Maker
description: Let the randomizer help you make decisions with a fun spin!
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-dice1 size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2" ry="2"></rect><path d="M12 12h.01"></path></svg>

name: Riddle Generator
description: Challenge yourself with randomly generated riddles of varying difficulty.

name: Word Scramble
description: Play with scrambled words and try to unscramble them against the clock.

name: Magic 8 Ball
description: Ask a question and let the magic 8 ball predict your future!
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-sparkles size-5"><path d="M9.937 15.5A2 2 0 0 0 8.5 14.063l-6.135-1.582a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.962L8.5 9.936A2 2 0 0 0 9.937 8.5l1.582-6.135a.5.5 0 0 1 .963 0L14.063 8.5A2 2 0 0 0 15.5 9.937l6.135 1.581a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .964L15.5 14.063a2 2 0 0 0-1.437 1.437l-1.582 6.135a.5.5 0 0 1-.963 0z"></path><path d="M20 3v4"></path><path d="M22 5h-4"></path><path d="M4 17v2"></path><path d="M5 18H3"></path></svg>

name: Flames Calculator
description: Calculate the flames of love between two names.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-flame size-5"><path d="M8.5 14.5A2.5 2.5 0 0 0 11 12c0-1.38-.5-2-1-3-1.072-2.143-.224-4.054 2-6 .5 2.5 2 4.9 4 6.5 2 1.6 3 3.5 3 5.5a7 7 0 1 1-14 0c0-1.153.433-2.294 1-3a2.5 2.5 0 0 0 2.5 2.5z"></path></svg>

name: Love Calculator
description: Calculate the love between two names.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-heart size-5"><path d="M19 14c1.49-1.46 3-3.21 3-5.5A5.5 5.5 0 0 0 16.5 3c-1.76 0-3 .5-4.5 2-1.5-1.5-2.74-2-4.5-2A5.5 5.5 0 0 0 2 8.5c0 2.3 1.5 4.05 3 5.5l7 7Z"></path></svg>

name: Chuck Norris Jokes
description: Get random Chuck Norris jokes that you can share or download as images!
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-sword size-5"><polyline points="14.5 17.5 3 6 3 3 6 3 17.5 14.5"></polyline><line x1="13" x2="19" y1="19" y2="13"></line><line x1="16" x2="20" y1="16" y2="20"></line><line x1="19" x2="21" y1="21" y2="19"></line></svg>
